Name: KMP
About the game: “KMP” is a projection tool of mouse keyboard on computer desktop. When you press the keyboard or click the mouse, the corresponding keys of the projection keyboard and mouse will change color! It is very suitable for live computer games, online video teaching and other scenarios. Combined with live broadcasting software, it can better interact with netizens and enhance the live experience! Please note: the button itself can not be clicked, non-virtual keyboard.
